about_the_game:
The Last Wish, a third-person exploration game diving you through the story of 5 different animals who was on the journey to complete their wishes. Players take control of different animals and discover their past and help them to reach their destiny. However, the main goal is not to just watch the stories but to learn the different perspective of life and how we are not alone with misfortunes in this world. In easy words this game will teach us that we are just a small scene in a very big picture, and we should value the things we have.

Key Features:

*Interactive Visual Novel, not moving 2d pictures but interactive so player can feel the environment.
*Not an "animal simulator," but an emotional, intimate story by a one-man team with an ending you won't soon forget.
*A short game (about an hour and a half) focused on storytelling and exploration.
